thread.title: Pantea Shahkaram

author: Pantea Shahkaram
title: Pantea Shahkaram
text:
I searched on the internet for days and was so frustrated with all the negative readings about other companies, so when I found Gift basket Ovearseas I read pretty good reviews and decided to use them and I was beyond satisfied with their service and communication system... if you're going to send things for your loved ones PICK THEM. You will not go wrong.
Thank you again GiftBasketOverseas :)
